pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### Matplotlib rcParams for GeoSpatial Plots =======================Installation-----```bashpip install geoplots -U```Usage-----```pythonimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltfrom geoplots import paramsplt.rcParams.update(params)```License-------This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.Anyone is free to copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell, ordistribute this software, either in source code form or as a compiledbinary, for any purpose, commercial or non-commercial, and by any means.
